## DropErc1155ClaimConditions.canClaim() method

Can Claim

**Signature:**

```typescript
canClaim(tokenId: BigNumberish, quantity: BigNumberish, addressToCheck?: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tokenId | BigNumberish |  |
|  quantity | BigNumberish |  |
|  addressToCheck | string |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

## Remarks

Check if a particular NFT can currently be claimed by a given user.

## Example


```javascript
// Quantity of tokens to check claimability of
const quantity = 1;
const canClaim = await contract.canClaim(quantity);
```
